title: Banana Bread
instructions: Bake 1 hour at 325°F.

title: Noodles
instructions: Marinate chicken with ginger, garlic and chilli powder overnight. Fry chicken, green onions and carrots together with stir fry sauce and consommé soup. Boil noodles and mix together with the other ingredients.

title: Fudge
instructions: Microwave for ten minutes in two minute increments, stirring after each. Beat for five minutes. Cool and serve in an 8x8 pan lined with parchment for easy cleaning.

title: Cheese Straws
instructions: Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

title: Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef with garlic, onion powder, chilli powder, and pepper. Drain oil. Add taco seasoning and cook according to the package instructions.

title: Nihari
instructions: Cut onions finely and lightly brown in oil. Add meat and fry with a little ginger and garlic. Add Nihari spice and cook on low for several hours, adding a little water to soften. Let dry, repeat until tender. When done, add lemon juice and serve with coriander, onions, lemon, and ginger.

title: Green Tomatoes
instructions: Cut tomatoes into slices. Season breadcrumbs with salt, pepper, chilli powder, cumin, and a little basil. Beat egg. Dip slices into egg then breadcrumb mixture. Pan fry in oil until browned.

title: Metre Specials
instructions: Cut meat into slices and tenderize. Prepare marinade and batter. Coat meat in flour, egg mixture, and breadcrumbs. Pan fry on low-medium heat, turning once.

title: Mango Mousse
instructions: Mix jello packets with 2 cups boiling water. Let cool in fridge without setting. Fold in remaining ingredients and refrigerate until set.

title: Hummus
instructions: Bake oiled pepper for an hour until skin peels. Remove skin and seeds. Drain chickpeas, keeping some water. Blend everything together, adding water if needed.

title: Chicken Balls
instructions: Marinate chicken overnight with ginger, garlic, salt, pepper, and chilli powder. Coat in golden puff batter and deep fry on low heat until cooked.

title: Meatballs
instructions: Mix all ingredients and let sit overnight. Roll into balls and bake at 350°F for 12-15 minutes, flipping halfway.

title: Kul Kuls
instructions: Mix sooji and margarine, add yolks. Make dough using coconut milk. Prepare sugar syrup. Deep fry medium heat until golden brown.

title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with ginger, garlic, tandoori spice, and yogurt. Bake at 350°F for 30-60 min. Brown onions in oil. Mix in chicken, tomatoes, butter chicken sauce, cream, butter, and green chillies. Add lemon juice if desired.

title: Barfee
instructions: Cook cheese and butter on medium until water dries. Add sugar, milk powder, ground almonds, and essence. Prepare square pan with parchment. Fill with half mixture, color remaining half, put on top. Cool and cut into thirds.

title: Easter Bread
instructions: Use mahlab powder instead of cardamom.

title: Toffee
instructions: Cook over low heat stirring occasionally. When mixture lifts from pan, add butter. Pour onto buttered board, roll with buttered wax paper to thickness. Cut and cool.

title: Pizza Dough
instructions: Mix ingredients into dough. Bake at 425°F for 15-25 minutes.

title: Short Bread Cookies
instructions: Mix ingredients into dough. Bake at 325°F for 20 minutes.

title: Fajitas
instructions: Use spices and oil to season meat or vegetables. Cook on medium heat as desired.

title: Choorah
instructions: Cook ingredients together in oil.

title: Fruit Cake
instructions: Mix fruits with spices and rum. Combine with flour mixture. Bake as desired.

title: Almond Paste
instructions: Mix ingredients into a dough. Brush cake with corn syrup. Use as filling or decoration.

title: Shepherds Pie
instructions: Brown minced meat with spices and onion soup. Layer with creamed corn and potatoes. Broil margarine on top until golden brown.

title: Zucchini Bread
instructions: Use your favorite zucchini bread recipe for ingredients and instructions.

title: Mince Curry
instructions: Brown onions until soft. Add spices. Cook on low for 1 minute. Add ground beef and brown. Add garlic, ginger, coriander, cumin, chilli powder, turmeric, and salt. Simmer with water if needed. Add potatoes if desired. Add crushed tomatoes halfway through cooking. Simmer until gravy thickens.

title: Samosas / Patties
instructions: Mix ingredients to prepare filling. Assemble samosas or patties and cook as desired.

title: Potato Samosa / Vegetable
ingredients: Optional spices: crushed cumin, turmeric, garlic, ginger, chat masala
instructions: Prepare vegetable filling with spices. Assemble samosas and cook until golden.

title: Salsas
instructions: Blend all ingredients to desired consistency.

title: Punch
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large bowl. Serve chilled.

title: Pina Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

title: Potato Chop
instructions: Prepare potato chops according to your preferred recipe.

title: Crème Brûlée
instructions: Mix sugar and eggs until combined. Heat cream and vanilla and combine slowly with eggs. Bake at 300°F in a water bath for 40 minutes until slightly set. Let set in fridge 24h. Brown sugar on top before serving.

title: Potato Soufflé
ingredients: 2 tbsp butter plus extra for greasing
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Butter ramekins. Microwave or boil potatoes until tender. Mash potatoes and mix with cheeses, chives, egg yolks, and warmed milk and butter. Fold in whipped egg whites. Bake 15-17 minutes until puffed and golden.

title: Kitty's Favorite Snickerdoodles
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Beat butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla until fluffy. Mix dry ingredients separately and combine with wet. Shape dough into 1 1/2 inch balls. Bake until golden.
